page.title: Ubiquiti Networks UniFi Switch Lite 16 PoE

revision.text:
{{Infobox Network Switch |image1 = Ubiquiti UniFi Switch Lite 01.jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = 16-Port Layer 2 Gigabit PoE Switch |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = https://store.ui.com/collections/unifi-network-switching/products/usw-lite-16-poe |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none -->
|brand = Ubiquiti Networks |model = UniFi Switch |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = Lite |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = USW-Lite-16-PoE |page_start_date = 06/26/2022 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.wi-cat.ru/Ubiquiti_Networks_UniFi_Switch_Lite_16_PoE |series = <!-- Device series --> |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification -->
|fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada ID, Leave blank for none --> |boardid = <!-- Baord ID --> |ethoui = D0:21:F9
|cpu1chip1 = Realtek;RTL8382M; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS |cpu1_type_rev = 4KEc |cpu1spd = 500 |cpu2chip1 = Nuvoton;M0516LDN; |cpu2_cores = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |cpu2_type = <!-- ARM,MIPS,X86, --> |cpu2_type_rev = <!-- CPU2 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu2spd = 50 |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = SPI NOR |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;MX25L12835FMI-10G; |flash1size = 16 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla2_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla2chip = Nuvoton;M0516LDN;onchip; |flash2size = 4 KiB |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR3 |ram1type1 = SDRAM |ram1spd = <!-- 3400,3333,3300,3200,3100,3000,2800,2666,2600,2400,2133,2000,1866,1600,1066,1333,800 --> |ram1size = 128 |ram1chip = Winbond;W631GG8NB-12; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |ram2type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram2type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram2spd = <!-- 3400,3333,3300,3200,3100,3000,2800,2666,2600,2400,2133,2000,1866,1600,1066,1333,800 --> |ram2size = 64 KiB |ram2chip = Nuvoton;M0516LDN;onchip; |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Realtek;RTL8218B; |eth3chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |eth4chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|sw_cpu = true |sw2chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |sw3chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|eth_ports = 16 |eth_speed = 1GbE |eth_conn = 8P8C |eth_conn_dongle = |eth_standard = <!-- IEEE 802.3/3u/3ab --> |auto_mdix = supported |sup_jumbo = yes |sw_class = managed
|exp_if_types = <!-- Expansion Interface types, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIExpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = <!-- Number of USB Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VAC |pwr_vac = 100-240 |pwr_ac_hz = 50/60 |pwr_amp_ac = 1.5 |pwr_poe_type = af/at |pwr_poe = <!-- POE Volts --> |pwr_poe_amp = <!-- POE Amps --> |pwr_conn = C13
|serial = yes,, 4-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1) |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |is_manuf = <!-- Yes or No --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |addchip = 802.3at PoE Interface and DC/DC Controller;TI;TPS23754;;1;,,, Octal Int. 802.3bt Compliant PSE Controller;Broadcom;BCM59121;;1;,,, 1MHz 2A Synchronous-Rectified Buck Converter;uPI Semi; uP9617P;;2;,,, <!-- Wide Input Range-->8A Synchronous-Rectified Buck Converter;uPI Semi;uP1741P;;1;,,, 8-bit Shift Register w/ 3-State Output;Unisonic;U74AHC595;;5;,,, 2-Wire Digital Temperature Sensor;On Semi;NCT75;;1;,,, 16-bit I2C-bus I/O Port Expander;NXP;PCA9555A;;2;,,, DC Input Half-Pitch Photocoupler;LiteOn;LTV-217;;2;,,, Low-Power Bidirectional I2C Isolator;TI;ISO1540;;1;,,, Quadruple Bus Buffer Gate;TI;SN74LVC125A;;1; |flags = Smart switch, PoE Switch, heatsink |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 06/2020 |price = 200 |upc = 810010071118 |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B08KC1YQZ9 |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Vietnam
|powledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |connactled = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |spdledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |leddupcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimmin = <!-- Size of device {{convert/3 |length|x|width|x|height|in|mm}} {{convert/3 |length|x|width|x|height|mm|in}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|switch}} ==Overview== "UBIQUITI®", "NETWORKS", "©2020", and "USW-LITE-16" are silkscreened on the main and PoE boards.
===Specifications=== *Processor: [[Realtek]] RTL8382M Multi-Layer Managed Switch :Controller with Embedded MIPS 4KEc @500MHz *Flash/RAM: 16MB (SPI NOR) Flash, 128MB (DDR3) SDRAM *LAN: 16x GbE (RJ45) ports, 8x w/PoE+ capability *32Gbps switching capacity *PoE: 802.3af (PoE), 802.3at (PoE+), 45W PoE budget
==Pictures== <center>'''User Images''' <gallery mode="slideshow"> File:USW-Lite-16-PoE Top.jpeg|Main Board Top File:USW-Lite-16-PoE Bottom.jpeg|Main Board Bottom File:USW-Lite-16-PoE PoE Top.jpeg|PoE Board Top File:USW-Lite-16-PoE PoE Bottom.jpeg|PoE Board Bottom File:USW-Lite-16-PoE Internal.jpeg|Internal </gallery></center>[[Has images::internal| ]]
